name: Hedo's conumdrum
description:
For CSCI-40 Met requirement of 40 lines of dialogue

Met requirement of 5 puzzles

Met requirement of color

Met requirement of world map

Met requirement of combat

Met requirement of inventory system

extract exe file from zipped folder via winrar or 7 zip, and everything should work fine.

Small RPG game made using RPG maker. Kinda rushed so if you encounter bugs don't be surprised. Also if you have trouble understanding exactly when you encounter the 5 puzzles they are located at the mine entrance, volcano, mansion, oasis, and ice palace. Because the switch puzzle is kinda hard, I will give you the answer for it here. In order to check to see if you got it right, you need to walk up to the door and check if it has unlocked, also the correct colors of the switches that you must enable are red and green. Overall I had a pretty fun time developing this game, kinda wish I had more time to polish it up, but I honestly wanted to get this assignment done. Hope you have fun playing, and good luck!

Note: some doors require the user to push enter in order to open them

Note: since the ice puzzle can be pretty close to impossible to solve, Ive included a video that you may use if you have trouble figuring it out
